title: Kim Kardashian goes after Spanx market with SKIMS underwear range
text:
Kim Kardashian posted a new photo to her 150M Instagram followers on Thursday.

The entrepreneur and mother-of-four was modeling a black bra and undies set from her new blockbuster SKIMS line called Solutionwear.

The 39-year-old siren promised that the $78 high-waisted bottoms go above and beyond their call of duty as they are 'bonded' which offers 'butt-smoothing' while 'tightly contouring your core' as she appears to be going after the SPANX market.

Move over SPANX! Kim Kardashian posted a new photo to her 150M Instagram followers on Thursday. The entrepreneur and mother-of-four was modeling a black bra and undies set from her new blockbuster SKIMS line called Solutionwear

The wife of Kanye West said her latest release of SKIMS is different.

'Our strongest Solutionwear™ is now available at SKIMS.COM,' said the Vogue cover model.

'I’m wearing the @skims High Waisted Bonded Brief ($78) - AVAILABLE NOW as part of the exclusive Contour Bonded collection,' added the Calabasas native.

The ad copy online reads: 'An everyday essential in a simple silhouette, this butt-smoothing high-waisted brief tightly contours your core. Its buttery, bonded construction makes this piece a staple for enhancing and contouring your natural shape.'

This comes after she talked about the shorts from SKIMS' The Contour Bonded collection in an Instagram video shared on Tuesday.

Glam all the time: The TV star had on heavy makeup with her hair pulled back

The latest release has even more control, as she noted in two videos taken inside her closet.

And in one of the clips she says that she made sure the control-top shorts have extra 'bonding' on the side so that cellulite on her thigh cannot be seen.

'I am big on cellulite on the thigh so I wanted to make sure there was extra bonding on the side of the thigh,' explained the mother of three.

More to buy: Kim shared an Instagram post on Tuesday about her next SKIMS line which is called The Contour Bonded collection

Hides all the flaws: And in one of the clips Mrs Kanye West, 39, says that she made sure the control-top shorts have extra 'bonding' on the side so that cellulite on her thigh cannot be seen

In the first clip, the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star says, 'It is totally different than our signature shapewear.

'Do you see this V?' asks Kim as she points to the front of the undies.

'This whole chart is lined in power mesh so it's like a really thick... this is for like if you need extra tummy,' says the star.

Indeed, the mesh looks strong enough to hold in even the most flabby midsection.

The V? In the first clip, the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star says, 'It is totally different than our signature shapewear. 'Do you see this V?' asks Kim as she points to the front of the undies

New styles: 'Everyday Solutionwear is like a medium hold - this is like major hold, holds in your tummy,' added the star who takes her time showing off the SKIMS pants as she wears a white top

Kim showed off her famous curves in her new range, proudly videoing in front of the mirror

Not her best: In 2017, Kim's shapewear let her down as lines, bumps showed

'Everyday Solutionwear is like a medium hold - this is like major hold, holds in your tummy,' added the star who takes her time showing off the SKIMS pants as she wears a white top.

Then the TV star turns around to show off her pert bottom. 'There is a sheerness on the butt to lift it all,' she adds. 'And there is a silicone strap.'

The caption for the post reads: 'The Contour Bonded collection offers the highest level of support for super strength smoothing and lifting.

Last week Kim wore a grey two piece from the first collection. The first photo came from her SKIMS Instagram account.

The caption said, 'Kim wears the Cotton Rib Tank ($34, available now in select sizes in Iris Mica and Mineral) and the Cotton Rib Brief ($28, available now in select sizes in Bone, Mineral, Kyanite, and Soot).'

The Selfish author is by her double sinks and there are two grey chairs behind her.

In her very big bathroom: Last week the daughter of Kris Jenner, 63, shared this image

Another new shot sees her in a dark grey SKIMS bra as she adds oversized shorts.

The beauty is touching her forehead as she models heavy makeup with her long hair worn down.

The KKW Beauty owner also has on white sneakers and thick socks.

Kim also looked sultry as she modeled a white bra and leggings while reclined on a large, round white sofa with pillows strewn about in her Hidden Hills, California mansion she shares with Kanye West and their four children.

Another model: Kim has been getting sister Kylie Jenner to hawk her SKIMS collection as well

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was announcing the launch of her SKIMS Cotton Collection, which debuted on October 15 online.

'My essential underwear and lounge pieces made from ultra soft cotton are coming soon!' said the Selfish author.

She then warned her 149M Instagram followers that the line will likely sell out fast.

'The SKIMS Cotton Collection is inspired by Kardashian’s favorite pieces for relaxing at home, and includes essential tees, tanks, leggings, slips, bras and underwear made from soft and natural fibers in muted, flattering tones,' a press release states.

Another line: Khloe Kardashian pushed her Good American activewear line on social media on Thursday morning

The SKIMS Cotton Collection sees classic bra and underwear styles 'modernized to combine the cool, everyday comfort and natural breathability of cotton with high-tech support,' it was added.

Cotton lounge is intended for layering and everyday casual wear, with ribbed tanks, thermal leggings, sporty boxers and slip dresses, it was also suggested.

Sizing for the collection ranges from XXS through 4XL in keeping with the brand’s emphasis on inclusivity.

SKIMS Cotton is priced from $18 for the Dipped Thong to $56 for the Balconette Bra.

The Cotton Collection comes in five colors: Bone, Mineral, Iris Mica, Soot, and Kyanite.
